FEATURES.TITLE: Main Features
FEATURES.DESCRIPTION: Discover all the tools we offer to simplify the management of your business forms.

CUSTOM_FORMS.TITLE: Custom Forms
CUSTOM_FORMS.DESC: Create forms tailored to the specific needs of each department.

DEPARTMENT_ORGANIZATION.TITLE: Department Organization
DEPARTMENT_ORGANIZATION.DESC: Manage forms by department for better organization and tracking.

EXPORT_PDF.TITLE: Export to PDF
EXPORT_PDF.DESC: Export forms and reports in PDF format for sharing or archiving.

ADVANCED_ANALYTICS.TITLE: Advanced Analytics
ADVANCED_ANALYTICS.DESC: View data and trends with interactive charts and customizable dashboards.

TEAM_COLLABORATION.TITLE: Team Collaboration
TEAM_COLLABORATION.DESC: Work together with different roles and permissions for each team member.

PROCESS_AUTOMATION.TITLE: Process Automation
PROCESS_AUTOMATION.DESC: Automate workflows with approvals and notifications.

DEPARTAMENTOS.DESCRIPCION: Select a department to access its forms.
